column4: does anyone know how I can check what version of Beryl / Compiz / whatever it is that I have, and whether it is compatible with my Ubuntu version (7.10)?  I just upgraded to 7.10 from 7.04 and my Beryl Window Manager is making the window borders disappear
nope, never where never will be -- beryl is discontinued and the compiz extras team joined with the compiz guys to create compiz-fusion
yes! get rid of beryl now!
